abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.78.1 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/docbook/code/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

section.title: Release Notes: 1.79.1
section.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.78.1 release.

section.title: Common
section.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.78.1 release.

screen.phrase: Added quotes around linkend to make spaces visible
Added ant build for HTML stylesheets
Initial work on Ant build, common (L10N) directory handled so far
Replace hardcoded English text for question and answer elements in mode="title.markup" with localized templates.
Move addns.xsl module from releasetools to common in preparation for switching to ns as the base stylesheets.
Add new locale file ur.xml for Urdu.
Add missing template with match="toc" mode="title.markup".
Fixed problem when referencing empty ulinks; use @url instead
Make olink errors/warnings overridable in customizations.
Pass the object referenced as a parameter to mode="intralabel.punctuation" template.

1. Make page citations on <xref/> to paragraphs conditional on a new parameter, $insert.xref.page.number.para, default to 'yes' (before, page citations were added unconditionally). Remove similar special-casing for <link/>.
2. Disable page citations for @xrefstyle="template:..." (if needed, they can be added with %p in the template - but they can't be disabled).
Pass referrer and target params to mode="xrefstyle" to allow customizations to be more specific.

Add mode="xrefstyle" to replace many instances of redundant code determining the xrefstyle with xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="xrefstyle". Also allows stylesheet customization to specify an xrefstyle per element type.
Add support for procedure title contained in info or blockinfo.
In person.name template, change 'style' variable to a param so the name style can be selected by passing a param.
Fix bug in collect.xref.targets that failed when $referrer template param not set by olink's xref-to. Fixed using submitted patch.

section.title: FO
section.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.78.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug #1368 "link to term with id does not work"
Fix bug #1367 double attribution in epigraph.
Add missing profile.outputformat param.
Fix namespace declarations.
Add default attribute-sets for new Publishers elements.
Fix typo
Add new DocBook Publishers elements.
Add inclusion of new publishers.xsl module.
Stylesheet module added to support new elements in DocBook Publishers.
Add the 9 new attribute sets for DocBook Publishers.
Fix bug #1355 glossseealso generates duplicate id in certain cases.
fix bug #1360 indexterm in varlistentry/term generates an error when xref to that term.
Fix bug #13598 inline.monoseq and other inline.*seq handle links incorrectly.
Fix bug in dbfo-need for admonitions, and get dbfo-need working properly in FOP1.1.
Remove obsolete hardcoded margin-left="0pt" for the block containing header or footer.
Fix bug #1336 to add support for recognizing file:/ image URLs as absolute paths.
Add support in TOC for article as child of set.
Fix bug #1337 Elements with olink role do not behave as olink elements.
Added ant build for FO

Only count regular <emphasis> elements (without @role="bold", etc) when determining whether nested emphasis needs to be displayed in italics or in regular; otherwise, the order of nesting in <emphasis role="bold"> and <emphasis> affects the font used.
Apply patch #190 to include refsections in bookmarks for fop1 and ptc.xsl.
Change the epigraph template to support schema extensions by processing all of its children instead of specific elements.

Added "user.declarations" hook to implemented [#1330]
Added empty "user.declarations" template to make it easier for adding custom fo:declaration elements. The template is empty by default.
Fix test for nested links.
Now biblioset outputs its id if it has one.
pass xrefstyle param from link element to gentext.template so optional page number can be formatted to a style.
Streamline handling of namespace fixup in preparation for making the namespaced version the source base.
FOP 1.1 now supports writing-mode="rl-tb", so add that change to the $direction.mode parameter.
Add missing xlink namespace declaration to the root element.
Add support for $autolink.index.see to automatically form links between see and seealso index elements and primary elements in the index.
Add element name to warning message for nested links.
Fix bug #1306: warn of nested links.
Fix bug #1320 so template page.sequence tests $content to make sure it is not empty.

para.literal: Robert Stayton: autotoc.xsl; refentry.xsl; param.xweb; docbook.xsl; param.ent; component.xâ‹¯

screen.phrase: Add support for $show.bookmarks param to turn bookmarks on or off.
Add missing variable bookmarks.state.
Add missing $document.element variable to new generate.bookmarks template.

para.literal: Robert Stayton: autotoc.xsl; refentry.xsl; param.xweb; docbook.xsl; param.ent; component.xâ‹¯

screen.phrase: Add support for standard XSL 1.1 bookmarks and parameter $xsl1.1.bookmarks to turn them on or off.
Fix invalid href generated if $insert.olink.pdf.frag=0 and $fop1.extensions=1.
Replace literal space inserted next to fo:leader in ToC with a padding. This works around a bug in FOP (see FOP-1444). Make ToC fo:leader properties configurable via attribute set.
Remove autoguessing of the namespace for wrapper elements; determine namespace by prefix, if any.
Bug #1246: added missing with-param.
Make olink errors/warnings overridable in customizations.

1. Make page citations on <xref/> to paragraphs conditional on a new parameter, $insert.xref.page.number.para, default to 'yes' (before, page citations were added unconditionally). Remove similar special-casing for <link/>.
2. Disable page citations for @xrefstyle="template:..." (if needed, they can be added with %p in the template - but they can't be disabled).
Skip generating fox:destination on a footnote - id attribute on footnotes is not passed to generated FO, so FOP complains about unresolved ID in destination.
Fixed typo.
Fixed bug#1311 and added missing para.properties
Pass referrer and target params to mode="xrefstyle" to allow customizations to be more specific.

Add mode="xrefstyle" to replace many instances of redundant code determining the xrefstyle with xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="xrefstyle". Also allows stylesheet customization to specify an xrefstyle per element type.
Pass referrer and xrefstyle to "xref-to-suffix" and "xref-to-prefix" modes (to use the same signature than "xref-to" mode) as discussed with Bob on the mailinglist (2013-09-12)
Fix for enhancement/bug#1312: Support font size in verbatim elements
Unchanged, testing snapshot builds.
No change, testing snapshot builds.
No change, testing snapshot builds.
No change, just checking snapshot build process.
Add missing template for tocdiv/title elements to fix bug #1310.
Fix process.root template so document title can come from info as well.
Add support for procedure title when contained in blockinfo or info.
Fix mode="fop1.foxdest" so only elements with id attribute get a fox:destination in the output.
Remove extraneous call from fop1.foxdest mode per patch submission.
Add toc.margin.properties attribute-set to list.of.titles so it matches the TOC list.
Adjust exception for fop for menuchoice separator to use the $symbol.font.family if it is set.
Fix comment.
Fix typo that prevents param.xsl update.
Add mark.optional.procedure.steps param.
Fix bug in question template that output empty list-item-label when defaultlabel = 'none'.

section.title: HTML
section.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.78.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix Bug #1367 epigraph attribution appears twice in html output.
Add missing profile.outputformat param.
Add support for DocBook Publishers elements.
New module to support new elements in DocBook Publishers schema.
Fix bug #1348 where class of output table not being set correctly.
A table emitted by tgroup template now calls "common.html.attributes" to get the class attribute handled correctly.
Fix bug #13598 inline.monoseq and other inline.*seq handle links incorrectly.
Add template for refpurpose in no.anchor.mode to generate the dash separator in TOC line for the refentry when the refpurpose contains a link or indexterm.
Add missing call to id.attribute template for orgdiv.
If a link or xref has an @id or @xml:id, then add a span to include the id because simple.xlink no longer generates the id attribute.
Remove call to id.attribute template in simple.xlink because it produces duplicate ids in the output because the element template calling simple.xlink generates the id attribute.

Check in fix for bug #1336 to support absolute file URLs that start with file:/. Also consolidate code that determines whether an image file path is relative into a new template variable $is.relative.
Add support for set nested inside set to recursive-chunk-filename.
Add support for set TOC to contain nested set or article elements.
Added clean targets
Added ant build for HTML stylesheets
Move any indexterms in glossentry to be inside dt, instead of after dt which is invalid.
Fix bug #1334 to copy through HTML table attributes @scope and @id.
Change the epigraph template to support schema extensions by processing all of its children instead of specific elements.
Fix bug in handling of multiple editors and "edited by" label.
Fix misnamed attribute in sidebar template.
Fix check for nested links.
Adjust handling of namespace fixup to streamline distro builds.
Adjust handling of namespace conversion to streamline distro build.
Fix bug #1298 where @rowheader = 'firstcol' incorrectly assigns <th> to cell that is first in a row but not the first column due to row span above.
Add support for autolink.index.see param to link from see and seealso element to primary element in index.
Fix bug #1306 warn of nested links, since not supported in the output.
Fixes bug #1323 where <?dbhtml-include?> paths were not being interpreted relative to the XML.
Add missing frag for new linke.to.self.for.mediaobject param.
Fix bug in entry template where rowsep was incorrectly set to zero for cell with @morerows in thead.
Restore conditional named anchor in output if dbcmdlist PI is not used.
Fixed [#1317]: process alt in inlinemediaobject
Fixed ticket [#1315]: Add possibility to add a link to mediaobjects
Remove autoguessing of the namespace for wrapper elements; determine namespace by prefix, if any.
Make olink errors/warnings overridable in customizations.

1. Make page citations on <xref/> to paragraphs conditional on a new parameter, $insert.xref.page.number.para, default to 'yes' (before, page citations were added unconditionally). Remove similar special-casing for <link/>.
2. Disable page citations for @xrefstyle="template:..." (if needed, they can be added with %p in the template - but they can't be disabled).
Bug #1309: Added missing template for indexdiv/subtitle.
Pass referrer and target params to mode="xrefstyle" to allow customizations to be more specific.

Add mode="xrefstyle" to replace many instances of redundant code determining the xrefstyle with xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="xrefstyle". Also allows stylesheet customization to specify an xrefstyle per element type.
Pass referrer and xrefstyle to "xref-to-suffix" and "xref-to-prefix" modes (to use the same signature than "xref-to" mode) as discussed with Bob on the mailinglist (2013-09-12)
No change, testing snapshot builds.
Add missing template for tocdiv/title elements to fix bug #1310.
Remove a comment to test checkins and snapshot builds.
Add support for procedure title when contained in info or blockinfo.
Enumarete separate file for revhistory if generate.revhistory.link=1
Update the inline.charseq template to also call 'common.html.attributes' instead of using local-name for class value.
Enabling ITS processing again
Change syntax for selecting @its:* attributes so it works in xsltproc (which should work with the original, but doesn't).
Turn off its.xsl update which is generating attribute insertion errors.
Added basic support for ITS 2.0 markup. It gets propagated into HTML For more info about ITS see http://www.w3.org/TR/its20/
Added a comment line to test checkin process.
Fix bug in mode=remove-ids that put link content outside the <a> element.
Fixed SF ticket#3611689: added missing DocBook namespace declarations
Change the internal chunk.base.dir from a param to a variable.
Turn off id attribute on glossterm anchor, because it is on the element itself.

section.title: Manpages
section.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.78.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug #1363 synopsis in variablelist term mangles line breaks.
Remove redundant and out-of-date xsl:strip-space element. This is imported from common/common.xsl for all stylesheets.
Added clean targets
Added ant build for manpages
Fix bug #1340 by omitting indexterm and remark elements from the output. Trying to include them as nroff comments resulted in extra whitespace in certain instances, so they are omitted.
Adjust man stylesheet to better handle namespace fixup during distro builds.
Resolve ambiguous template match for remark.
Put internally generated earmark elements into own namespace to avoid complications with namespace stylesheet builds. No change of function.
Fixed bug #1313 where write.stubs template mistakenly includes $man.output.base.dir in the .so address.
Escape text() nodes while also in no.anchor.mode for links. Fixes bug #1322.
Fixed bug #1321, also taking into account fixing bug #1281.
Fix a typo (http://bugs.debian.org/698962).

section.title: Epub
section.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.78.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug #1341 Incorrect generation of content.opf for multiple names in $html.stylesheet param. Backported the template named css.item from the epub3 stylesheet.
Fix handling of base.dir, chunk.base.dir, and epub.oebps.dir combinations.
Improve the handling of $chunk.base.dir when $base.dir contains the OEBPS directory in its value.
Fix the namespace fixup step to match the other stylesheets.
Extended date template in mode opf.metadata If a PI dbtimestamp is available, call datetime.format(date, 'Y-m-d'), otherwise use the normalized string content
Fix svn:externals defintion.
Introduced variable in opf.guide
Improved modularization in opf.spine and created new spine.cover template
Improved opf.spine with info variable
Bugfix in opf.spine: removed double refentry entries
* Template package-identifier: introduced $info variable to simplify code (similar to the EPUB3 stylesheets) * Template opf.calloutlist: only call opf.reference.callout if callout.graphics is set

Backported Bob's EPUB3 changes to EPUB2 from r9740 -> r9742 -> r9743:
* Implement base.dir/OEBPS using internal chunk.base.dir instead of new param epub.base.dir.
* Additional changes, specific to this stylesheet: - Construct parameter epub.metainf.dir from base.dir + 'META-INF/' - Changed parameter epub.cover.filename epub.oebps.dir to chunk.base.dir - Template opf: concat base.dir with epub.opf.filename - Replaced two subsequent xsl:value-of's with concat()
Fix bug in author template generating a span element inside an attribute value.
